ARABIC: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We tried, as usual, to travel to heaven in search of news but found it filled with fierce guards and meteors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We sought to pry into the secrets of the heavens, but found it full of fierce guards and shooting flames.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that “we tried to pry (the secrets of) the heaven, but we found it full of terrible guards and shooting meteors”;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We went near the heavens but found it to be full of strong guards and shooting flames.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And we reached the sky, so we found it strongly guarded and filled with comets.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: `And we have sought to reach the heaven; but we found it filled with stern guards and flaming fires.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that we sought to reach heaven, but we found it filled with strong guards and flaming stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And we stretched towards heaven, but we found it filled with terrible guards and meteors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (the Jinn who had listened to the Qur'an said): We had sought the heaven but had found it filled with strong warders and meteors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sought to reach heaven, but found it filled with strong guards and flames --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we sought to reach the heaven; then we found it filled with a strong guard and darting meteors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed we made for the heaven and found it full of mighty sentries and flames.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And we pried into the secrets of heaven; but we found it filled with stern guards and flaming fires.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And we have sought to reach the heaven; but found it filled with stern guards and flaming fires.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (The jinn continued saying): "We made our way towards heaven, but we found it filled with stern guards and a flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We probed the heaven, and found it filled with stern guards and projectiles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:8] The jinn say: And we made for the heaven, we desired to listen by stealth, but we found it filled with mighty guards, from among the angels, and meteors, scorching stars: this was at the time of the sending of the Prophet (s).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then went back to the talk of the jinn, saying: (And (the jinn who had listened to the Qur'an said): We had sought the heaven) before we accepted faith (but had found it filled with strong warders) angels (and meteors) preventing them from listening.
